issue.title: SDF_VERSION need to distinguish between protocol version and pkg version.

content.raw:
Your proposed variable names sound good.

A side question that connects to ABI compatibility:

Should the sdf protocol version be accessed from a `#define` in a header file or a library call (ie. `std::string SDF::GetVersion()`)? Maybe it depends on the use case. But currently I think we don't have a way to query an sdformat library for its protocol version number.
content.html:
Your proposed variable names sound good.

A side question that connects to ABI compatibility:

Should the sdf protocol version be accessed from a #define in a header file or a library call (ie. std::string SDF::GetVersion())? Maybe it depends on the use case. But currently I think we don't have a way to query an sdformat library for its protocol version number.
